title: Quick Take: Clinton's Email Server Case
description: Hillary Clinton and her staff were "extremely careless" in handling classified data over a private email server while she was secretary of state, FBI Director James Comey said Tuesday — but the FBI is recommending that no charges be brought against her.  Carrie Johnson, NPR's justice correspondent, joins host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders and editor/correspondent Ron Elving to discuss. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
